Adya.intro:
🛍️ PRODUCT NAME: ADYA™ – The Chaos Coder with Big Main Character Energy

✨ FEATURES:
- Ships with high emotional intelligence and 0 filter
- Debugs code & people with equal passion
- Auto-activates on drama detection

📦 WHAT'S IN THE BOX:
- 1 Certified Vibe Curator™
- Unlimited playlists
- Flashcards of random facts you didn’t ask for

🧃 USE CASES:
- Emergency pep talks
- Late-night existential philosophy
- Spontaneous adventures

💬 CUSTOMER REVIEWS:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “I feel cooler just knowing her.”
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “She’s like ChatGPT but with earrings.”

⚠️ WARNING:
May cause motivation, emotional clarity, and giggle fits. Handle with snacks.

Stuti.intro:
🕵️‍♀️ WANTED: STUTI “The Softcore Storm”

📁 RAP SHEET:
- Offense #1: Stealing hearts with aesthetic Instagram stories
- Offense #2: Disappearing for 3 days and returning with a new playlist
- Offense #3: Saying “let’s do it” and meaning it

👀 LAST SEEN:
Cuddled up in a hoodie with a vanilla latte, reading poetry and ignoring notifications.

💣 NOTABLE SKILLS:
- Manipulating light for perfect selfies
- Emotionally powerful stare
- Sending voice notes that could win Oscars

📢 QUOTE TO REMEMBER:
"Wait... did I just romanticize pain again?"

🤑 REWARD:
One long drive and unlimited aux access.

Khushi.intro:
🛍️ PRODUCT NAME: KHUSHI™ – Laugh Bomb, Chaos Generator, Meme Royalty

✨ FEATURES:
- Laughter so contagious, it breaks Bluetooth connections
- Comes preloaded with 10,000 memes & zero chill
- Unmatched “vibe check” radar

📦 WHAT'S INCLUDED:
- 1 oversized hoodie
- 3 fake plans
- 7 voice notes that are basically podcasts

💬 CUSTOMER REVIEWS:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “Giggled so hard I forgot my sadness.”
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “A living moodboard.”

⚠️ WARNING:
Do not consume with caffeine. Already hyper.

Vanya.intro:
🕵️‍♀️ WANTED: VANYA “The Strategic Wizard”

📁 CRIMES COMMITTED:
- Possession of 47 tabs open at once (intent to analyze)
- Conspiracy to over-organize the friend group
- First-degree crime: Mastermind-level sarcasm

🔍 M.O.:
Answers questions with more questions. Will psychoanalyze you for fun.

🧠 SPECIAL ABILITIES:
- Remembers everything you said in 2019
- Knows when you’re lying before you do
- Can code emotions into spreadsheets

📢 INFAMOUS LINE:
“Technically, I’m right.”

🎯 WANTED FOR:
Excessive competence. Reward: One structured debate.

Aditi.intro:
🛍️ PRODUCT NAME: ADITI™ – The Audio Note Oracle of the Night Realm

✨ FEATURES:
- Sends voice notes longer than Netflix episodes
- Cries, laughs, and heals – all in one conversation
- Emotionally fluent in all 17 Indian languages

📦 WHAT’S IN THE BOX:
- 1 cup of chai
- 2 journals of secrets
- Endless warmth

💬 CUSTOMER REVIEWS:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “She read my soul like it was a PDF.”
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “If feelings were an app, she coded it.”

⚠️ NOTE:
Melts under direct confrontation. Recharge with compliments.

Avni.intro:
🕵️‍♀️ WANTED: AVNI “The Outfit Assassin”

📁 CHARGES:
- Unlawful level of fashion at casual brunches
- Smuggling Pinterest boards into real life
- Being too pretty to take seriously

💃 KNOWN MOVES:
- Makes you feel underdressed in pajamas
- Slays silently in shades of pastels

📍 LAST SEEN:
Pinterest? No, real life. She exists.

💬 QUOTE ON FILE:
“I just threw something on.”

🛍️ REWARD:
Unlimited mirror selfies and fashion consultations.

Nandini.intro:
🛍️ PRODUCT NAME: NANDINI™ – Curiosity Overdrive, Candy-Powered Human™

✨ FEATURES:
- Reads Wikipedia for fun
- Knows 12 conspiracy theories and 5 scientific ones
- Will challenge your brain and then hug you

🍬 INCLUDED:
- 2 pockets of random candy
- 5 impulsive Google searches
- 1 wildly passionate opinion about obscure topics

💬 CUSTOMER REVIEWS:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “She made me believe in aliens. I’m okay with it.”
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ “Her mind is like a Netflix documentary – thrilling, deep, and sweet.”

⚠️ WARNING:
Do not leave unattended in science museums.
